title: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair on the hands: seeing the appearance of hair in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming of removing hair from the left hand with sugaring. Removing body hair for a single woman, for a girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin, from the legs, removing the genital organs. Interpretation of a dream about hair removal: A dream about hair removal in a dream carries many meanings for you, including that a crisis or anxiety has passed over you, but you will end it with the disappearance of the difficulties surrounding it. It is part of your life, and this is the idea of ​​hair removal methods. If you are pulling your hair from your body in a dream, this means that you have lost an important opportunity in your life and you regret it because you could not benefit from it as it should, and this is the case, if it is not too late. for you. opportunity, then reconsider. Once you see that your body hair has been completely removed, this indicates that you have carried a heavy burden on your shoulders, but there is someone who accepts you because of a big problem, so be careful. If the hair is removed from your hands in a dream, this means that Your fears will stop and the trick will definitely come to you. Removing hair in aphids indicates the return of trust that a person had from another person who handed it over to him. Interpretation of a dream about waxing in a dream can also indicate spending money on a project that will bring you a lot of profitsPubic Hair Removal: Follow The Sunnah of the Prophet, and removing hair indicates paying off debts. A dream about arm hair appearing in a dream. If you are in debt, you may have borrowed money before and paid it back, and now you will borrow again and be angry with it, and God knows best. And if you are not in debt, then seeing hair in a dream indicates worries in your life and you want to get rid of them. Among them, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which one sees or hears Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, and Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream indicates a lot of goodness in the life of the beholder and abundance of sustenance, as it indicates a large number of offspring of boys and girls. girls. Safety and reassurance, it sends fear and anxiety to others and makes them do a lot of research behind the interpretation of this dream, its interpretation and meaning, and wonders whether this dream appears good or bad, and this is what we know through the article.Interpretation of the dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream by Ibn SirinAccording to Ibn Sirin: If a man sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this indicates this person. And God Almighty will bless him with abundant sustenance and abundance. He will achieve many of the goals and ambitions that he wanted to achieve. And if a man sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this indicates that the man will get married. He is close to a righteous woman and has good offspring from that woman. This man has many offspring from her, and may God bless him with daughters and sons. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees Surat Cleavage in a dream, this indicates that this girl wants to achieve many goals and ambitions. After this dream, this woman will be able to achieve all those goals and aspirations that she desires. If an unmarried girl sees that someone in a dream is reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq, this indicates That this person will propose to this girl and that this girl will marry him and her wedding date is approaching. Interpretation of Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this means that this woman will be blessed with a pregnancy soon. She will have a good wife and he will have many blessings. Sons and daughters. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Al-Inshaqaq, this indicates that this woman lives with her husband in a happy and stable life full of love and tenderness. And that she will obtain a lot of goodness and a lot of sustenance in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or Hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dreamInterpretation of Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream, this means that this woman is close to her due date. And that she and her fetus will be in good health, and God will give her what she loves and desires. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is reciting Surat Al-Inshaqaq, this means that this woman feels fear and anxiety. As long as her due date approaches, she is worried about the fetus, and after this dream, she and her fetus will be in good health. Interpretation of Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream about a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees Surat Al-Inshaqaq in a dream, this indicates that this woman is facing a lot. From worries, problems and difficulties. After this dream, this woman will get rid of these worries and difficulties. If a divorced woman sees herself reading Surat Al-Inshiqaq in a dream, this means that this woman is like that. God will reunite her with her husband and she will live a happy and stable life with him. He will compensate for life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Dreams are a group of illusions that occur to a person while he is sleeping, and dreams differ in the extent of the coherence and logic of their events and dreams. There are two types, the first type is lost dreams, which are irrational fantasies that have no explanation and come from Satan, and the second type is visions, which are logical dreams that have an explanation and coherent facts. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of gold by Ibn Shaheen and al-Nabulsi. The two imams Ibn Shaheen and al-Nabulsi are considered famous scholars in the field of interpretation. Dreams and they have many interpretations of dreams, including the interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman, which is as follows: Bracelets and ankle rings in a dream represent a husband, father, or brother. If a woman sees that she is handing over her gold, and among them is a large amount of gold, this is evidence of her strength. As for the mother who saw gold It turns into silver, this is evidence of her corruption. Seeing silver turned into gold is evidence of a better future. Seeing a gilded house is evidence of the safety of the house and it will burn. Knowing that gold is melting is evidence of a woman’s involvement in a scandal. Seeing the manufacture of gold bullion is a sign of coming evil capable of destroying a life. One.Interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most prominent sheikhs in interpreting dreams. It has many interpretations of dreams, and the dream of gold is one of them. Here we present Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about gold for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing a golden ring, this is a sign that she will give birth to a boy. Seeing her wearing a gold chain indicates ease and facilitation of childbirth and indicates that the newborn is a beautiful female. Also, seeing gold in a pregnant woman’s dream Evidence of the health of the fetus and the ease of childbirth, God willing. If gold is broken in a dream, it is evidence of many problems with her husband and the evil that surrounds him. As for a pregnant woman who wears a gold necklace, it indicates that the husband will obtain a prominent position and a high status. Seeing that she gave the necklace to her husband It indicates the progress of their married life. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of an individual dream varies depending on the details in it and the difference in the dreamer, whether he is a man or a woman, and his social status. Here we present the interpretation of a dream about gold for an unmarried girl. Ibn Sirin: If an unmarried woman sees gold in her dream, this is evidence of the joy that she will see from marriage in the near future, and God knows best. But if she sees someone giving her a gold ring or bracelet, this is evidence of the abundant sustenance that she will obtain. Seeing an unmarried woman A married woman wearing a golden crown is a sign of her marriage to a person of high rank and status who will love and protect her. And if she sees that the gold has broken in her dream, this indicates that she will lose the one she loves or end her engagement. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. The dream of seeing gold in a dream is considered... A strange dream that is rarely dreamed of, and here we mention Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dream of gold for a married woman whose interpretation of her dream varies. . From other women: Gold in a married woman’s dream indicates h

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing yourself running in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of running seen in a dream in its entirety is considered one of the main books of major scholars, where they interpret dreams and visions. In addition, running is one of the foundations of revitalizing the body and providing energy. In addition, seeing running in a dream comes to many, so we provide site subscribers with all the facts about the difficulty of running in a dream, as well as the interpretation of running and fear. In a dream and in a dream about running, we have also collected for you the reason why you dream of running in a dream for single and pregnant women, as well as for men. What is the dream of running according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing fast running in a dream is a sign of exhaustion and the difficulty of being able to earn a living. Also, seeing running in The dream testifies to the dreamer achieving his desires and goals that he achieves in his life. Seeing a sick person running in a dream is full of desirable visions for him, which indicates a quick recovery from the illness. A person running away from someone running after him in a dream says that the dreamer will miss many important opportunities in His life. Falling while running in a dream indicates that the dreamer faces many problems and obstacles and is going through difficult circumstances. Running with family and relatives in a complete dream indicates the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness and extreme fear of separation from his loved ones. Dream Run Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi explained that running in a dream is complete evidence of That the dreamer will quickly achieve what he wants in life. It is also easy for the student to completely enter the dream, which means that he will achieve success and excellent grades in his studies. Running in the dream of a person in the prime of life testifies to his hard work and ability to achieve goals and ambitions. The man’s running is complete. In a dream, the interpretation of seeing a person running peacefully and calmly in a complete dream shows the religion and high morals that he enjoys and the application of God’s law in his life. Running barefoot in a dream is full of visions that indicate that the dreamer is going through difficult life situations and feelings of anxiety and sadness. A man sees himself running in a dream. And someone looks at him – this is a sign of envious people. Also, seeing a fast running person in a dream is a sign that a man will quickly achieve all his goals and desires. Why dream of running in a dream full of public womenThe interpretation of a girl who dreams of running and chasing someone shows her ability to overcome Her problems and sorrows. Escaping from a predator and escaping from it in a complete dream for a girl means the end of all difficulties, getting rid of dangers, and entering into a happy life. The dream of a young man chasing an unmarried woman is evidence that he will get married in the coming days, God willing. Why dream of running after a car? Running after a car in a dream It has been completed, and the dreamer's ability to reach it is a vision that portends goodness and high status. Also, to see in a dream that he is running after a car and cannot get it, says that he will achieve his goals, but with difficulty and after time has passed. Why dream of running and being afraid? Interpretation in a dream of seeing yourself Running and being afraid of something indicates that this person will face some pressure and loss. Also, dreaming of running and being afraid and then tripping is evidence that he will face difficulties.

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead giving a thermos in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of giving the deceased a thermos in a dream. There are many dreams that a person sees in his sleep, especially when he sees the deceased in a dream, which carries many different meanings and interpretations. The dreamer’s social status and the situation surrounding him, and seeing the dead giving a lupine in a dream, which is one of the types of food with a delicious taste, has a number of interpretations, and therefore the vision of giving the dead a lupine will appear in the dream. The interpretation of the dead giving a lupine in a dream is the dead’s gift to live, the lupine to the dream, It has elements of optimism. A gift from the deceased in a dream has many positive interpretations that indicate goodness and giving and are related to positive topics. It was necessary to provide some evidence to interpret the dead giving a lupine in a dream: If you see a lupine in a dream and the dead give it to you, this means that this person will have a lot in the coming period. Seeing a lupine in a dream and giving it to the dead means that the crises that this person is going through are coming. It indicates Interpretation of seeing a deceased person giving a lupine in a dream indicates that this person will receive a promotion at work. A deceased person giving a lupine in a dream to a pregnant woman. Interpretation of dreams of seeing a yellow lupine in a dream shows goodness and success from God in many matters in life. Seeing yellow lupine in a dream shows many good qualities and that there are many things that will improve, and according to his interpretation for the pregnant woman, it came as follows: Indicating that the gender of the baby will be male. Seeing sweet lupine in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her birth will be easy. Giving A lupine for a pregnant woman in a dream means that she will give birth to twins. A deceased person giving a lupine to a pregnant woman in a dream means that the baby’s condition will be good. A dead person giving a lupine in a dream to an unmarried woman. A lupine in a dream has many positive meanings, and when an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the deceased gives her Yellow lupine in a dream, this indicates that there is a large and abundant diet that you will have in the next stage, and therefore one of the clues to interpreting the vision of the dead giving lupine in the solo is as follows: The deceased giving lupine in a dream to an unmarried woman is considered a sign that there will be a marriage It will happen to her soon. A deceased person giving a thermos to an unmarried woman indicates that she will receive a large expense in the next moment. A thermos for an unmarried woman from dying in a dream indicates that she will spend a marriage near a person with good morals. A thermos for an unmarried woman in a dream indicates To the fact that God will give her a good husband with high morals. Giving the deceased a thermos in a dream to a divorced woman. There are many interpretations of the deceased giving a thermos in a dream to a divorced woman. Giving the deceased in general to a living person in a dream indicates that there is a lot of good and blue that this person will receive, and therefore Among the interpretations of giving the body in a thermos, including: Giving a thermos in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving chocolate from someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that you take chocolate from someone in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream that you take chocolate from someone in a dream and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation, let us get to know the interpretations of working scholars for this dream, and the reader should know The officials on the site do not make interpretations, but rather they are from the heart the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream of receiving chocolate from someone in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that he took chocolate from someone indicates the happiness and joys that the dreamer can obtain during this time. If a person sees that he has eaten chocolate in a dream, this may indicate the end of his worries and sorrows, thanks to God. A person’s dream of receiving chocolate from someone may indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period. Everyone who dreams of receiving chocolate from someone It may indicate money and goods that the dreamer may acquire during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of obtaining a piece of meat in a dream If you see yourself taking a piece of raw meat in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of sustenance and halal money that the dreamer will acquire during this period Seeing yourself eating a piece of meat in a dream may indicate a great benefit that the dreamer may obtain during this time, thanks to God. If one sees that he obtained a piece of meat in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of corruption that he may encounter during... This time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving a piece of meat in a dream indicates the abundant benefits that the dreamer will reap during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of receiving a white dress from the dead in a dream. It is possible that the dream of the dead giving the living a white dress in a dream is It indicates the dreamer’s long life, and God knows best. Dreaming of a white dress from a dead person may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer at that time. Seeing a white dress taken from the dead in a dream may indicate that the dreamer bears a lot of responsibility for that period. In If one sees that he wore a white dress in a dream from among the dead, this may indicate the dreamer’s expected happiness during this period, and God knows best. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a boy and a handsome boy in a dream

preview.html:
Interpretations of a dream about a boy: Does seeing a boy portend good or ill? What are the negative symbols in a boy’s dream? What does the loss of a boy in a dream portend? In the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a boy for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin and interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a boy: A boy in a dream means that he faces problems and troubles in his life, and if the dreamer sees a child in his dream, this is a sign of his bad luck and the obstacles that stand in his way and prevent him. Of achieving his dreams. It is said that giving birth to a boy in an anguished dream is a sign of his relief and removing problems from his shoulders, but seeing a merchant is evidence that he will soon enter into a failed business partnership and lose a lot of money. Because this must be careful, and if the dreamer sees a young child, he feels weak and collapsed because he was defeated in front of his enemies. Interpretation of a dream about a boy by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets carrying a young boy in a dream as a sign of progress in work and reaching the highest positions soon, and if the dreamer sees His wife gives birth to a son, it means that he will be exposed to it. For some problems in the future, but he will get out of them after a short time with patience and willpower. If the dreamer sees a woman breastfeeding a child in his sleep, this is a sign of the blessed, legitimate money that he will receive soon.
L Change life circumstances for the better in the coming tomorrow. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Dream Interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. From the effort to get it, and if the dreamer sees a young boy looking at her, this is a sign that she will make a decision soon, and this decision has brought about many positive changes in her life and she will never regret it. If the dreamer sees a young boy, this indicates the financial burdens and responsibilities that she bears. The large one that falls on her shoulders, and scholars interpreted seeing a boy in the house for an unmarried woman as meaning that she will soon hear good news for her. She had been waiting to hear it for a long time... Ali, the handsome and attractive young man, caught her attention with his tact and sweet talk, and she quickly fell in love with him. Interpretation of a dream of a young boy for an unmarried womanScientists interpret seeing a young boy in a dream for an unmarried woman as a sign that she will marry her lover and that she will give birth after Short time after the wedding. Be careful and do not trust anyone easily. Interpretation of a boy’s dream about a married woman: A boy in a dream for a married woman symbolizes that she will soon have some disagreements with her partner and she will have to be patient and try to understand him so that things do not escalate and lead to separation. Calmness and peace of mind.If the dreamer sees a sad boy, this does not bode well. This may indicate the death of a relative or hearing some unpleasant news soon. A child in a dream is a sign of difficult things in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a handsome boy for a married woman. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a whole bag of coffee in a dream?

preview.html: Trend offers you the interpretation of seeing a full bag of coffee in a dream. It is known that coffee bags are the bags in which ground coffee is placed and which are sold in all places around the world. Coffee is also one of the most important beverages spread around the world. Therefore, seeing coffee bags in a dream is important for many. There are people in their dreams. Therefore, we have presented to you, dear followers, the complete interpretation of seeing a bag of coffee in a dream by the leading scholars of dream interpretation and visions. We have also collected for you the interpretation of seeing a whole bag of coffee in a dream for single women, pregnant women, and also for men. The interpretation of seeing a whole bag of coffee in a dream is complete. Seeing coffee bags in a dream indicates some written problems and concerns, and it is also a sign of the occurrence of some postponed things in the dreamer’s mind. Opening a bag A whole bag of coffee in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the opening of problems and the occurrence of some fears that the dreamer will suffer a little in his life. Also, to see yourself buying a whole bag of coffee in a dream means that the dreamer will have many opportunities that he missed in his previous life. To see Yourself opening a bag of coffee and then throwing it full on the ground in a dream means losing money and also disputes that cause sadness and distress to the dreamer. Giving someone a full bag of coffee in a dream is a sign of good relationships, love, good communication and a sign of ending disputes and problems. Seeing a full bag of coffee Coffee in a dream for an ordinary woman: Seeing coffee bags in a dream filled with an ordinary woman and they were on a shelf in the supermarket is good news that she will succeed in her studies and her career. Also, seeing a beautiful and expensive bag of coffee in a dream means that you will marry a young man who is rich in money and has a high status in society. To see myself drinking coffee in a dream full of common women in general is one of the desired visions that indicate the end of problems and freedom from the corruption that has afflicted them. Seeing a full bag of coffee in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of the vision of serving coffee to the husband in a dream is complete for a woman of praiseworthy visions and an indication of the approaching Pregnancy and providing a good successor. Also, dreaming of buying a whole bag of coffee without opening it means that you will do things that the husband does not welcome and may cause problems. Seeing a whole bag of coffee opened in a dream for a married woman indicates some of the problems and difficulties that she will go through and suffer during this period of her life. If you see coffee from a full bag in your dream, this means that you will face many dangers that will cause and indicate anxiety. A full bag of coffee in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing coffee bags in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth to a male child who will be one of the successful and accomplished people in life. Drinking coffee in a pregnant woman's full dream is one of the visions that indicate an easy and affordable birth and a quick improvement in her overall health. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 78 in a dream and what the number 78 signifies

preview.html: The number also shows the great interest that the dreamer has in knowing all the things around him, and seeing the dream indicates the great good that the dreamer will gain through his intelligence. Interpretation of seeing the number 78 in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl dreams that she sees the number 78 a lot in a dream. Here, it indicates her wise decisions regarding many important issues that she goes through in life. Either the single woman who dreams that her fiancé writes the number 78 to her in a dream. It is an indication of her great success in something she is doing at this time in her life, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. And the unmarried woman who is looking for the presence of the number 78 in her dream and does not find it. This indicates that she is distracted by many things that she is going through at this time in her life, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing the number 75 in a dream Interpretation of seeing the number 78 in a dream for a married woman A married woman who writes the number 78 in a dream is a good thing that she will see in her life. It will save her from some of the marital problems she is going through. And if a married woman sees that her husband asks her for the number 78 in a dream. Here it indicates the happy life that this married woman and her husband live, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. A married woman is looking for the number 78 and it was written in very small handwriting in a dream. It indicates that there is optimism and a little hope in her life towards something she has been trying for a long time. Interpretation of seeing the number 78 in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman dreams that she was drawing the number 78 in a dream. Here, it shows the new decisions she is making in her life during this period. Likewise, a divorced woman looks at a man she does not know who gives her the number 78 written on a piece of paper. Here it indicates her close marriage to a good and righteous man. And you will be happy with him, God willing. And the dreaming divorced woman who saw in a dream that her house number was 78 was happy with it. This is a sign that she got rid of a big problem that she was facing at this time in her life. Here it indicates That this dreamer will have something bad happen and will suffer from it for a long time in his life. And seeing that the man did many important things in his work and exceeded the number 78. Here it explains that the dreamer is going through bad circumstances, and is thinking about some problems at the present time. The man who dreams that he draws the number 78 and was very handsome in the dream. Here it indicates his bright future and that he will achieve some things that will come in his life, God willing. It expresses her great wisdom in many of the difficult issues that she is going through in her life at this time. The pregnant woman who prepares a lot of her country and reaches 78 in a dream. This is a clear indication that she was relieved of a big problem that was about to enter her life. And the pregnant woman who

title: Interpretation of a tooth falling out in a dream: seeing teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about a molar falling into the hand without pain, removing the upper and lower molar, for a pregnant woman, for a married woman, for an unmarried woman, by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a tooth removed in a dream Molars in a dream refer to the elders of the dreamer or their choice, and anything that falls from the molars or teeth indicates a lack of money or the soul. Molars are the people of the house of the farthest men, or those who adorn themselves with them, or boys who do not reach a degree, so what is above what is after the eye is men, and what is less than what is next to the beard is from women. Whoever sees in one of them an increase, and the advantage of strength, or whiteness, and beauty, then he sees what that tooth enjoys of pleasure, and whoever sees that his tooth has come out of it, he has died, and it is said that he has a debt to God Almighty, or that he has a trust to pay to its owner, or that he will cut off the womb of the one to whom the molar is attributed. Whoever sees that one of his molars or one of his teeth is hurting him, then he hears bad things from his relatives attributed to that molar, or tightens it with his pains. Removing the molar in a dream indicates a long life without his peers. If he sees that all his teeth have fallen out, he will live long. If he sees that all his teeth have fallen out and he can no longer see them, his family will die before him or he will pass away. He dreams that his upper teeth fall into his hand, it is money that comes to him, and if it falls into his lap, it is a male child, and if it falls to the ground, it is a calamity of death. Whoever dreams that his lower teeth fall out suffers from pain, aches, delusions and sorrows. Whoever has a debt, if his teeth fall out in a dream, this indicates that he will pay off his debt. If he sees that a tooth has fallen out, he will pay off all his debts at once. If all his teeth fall out, everyone in that house and friends will die. Whoever dreams that his teeth fall out while he is holding them in his hand, this indicates the death of children. If you make your own dentures, this means that serious experiences will surround you and you will try to get rid of them. If you lose your teeth, this means that you will bear fears that will crush your pride and destroy your interests and business. If you receive a fatal blow to your teeth, this portends a sudden calamity, either you will lose at work, or you will get sick, or you will be visited by death, or you will be afflicted with a sudden accident. If you check your age, this means that it warns you of the need to be careful and take care of your affairs, as enemies are planning to besiege you. If your teeth are exposed to decay and damage, this means health and work problems. Whoever sees his teeth being pulled out of their place and displaced from their places, And the higher one is lower, and the lower one is higher, this indicates that the women of his family are much higher than their men. And whoever sees a defect in his teeth, this indicates the dispersion of his family, and the appearance of a defect among them, or the scarcity of his money. And if he cleans the meat between his teeth, he will hurt people and curse them with his tongue. And it is said: Whoever sees his teeth falling out, it portends evil for some of his friends, and if he sees all his teeth falling out in his hand or with him, then the offspring of the people of that house and their number will increase. And the falling of the tooth if it is not eaten, and he takes it in his hand, or bites it in his clothes, and if it is pregnant, then the son will come to him, otherwise it will be the righteous brother or relative. Cut it off. For him far away, if it is blood, then this is the sin of severing the ties of kinship, unless he has a debt, in which case he will be asked for it, and
